div.bibl: DIE ABENDPOST, October 31st, 1895. Institution For The Epileptics.

body.p: The German pastors, O. J. Ebert and E. Mathes have formed an organization under the name"Christian German Aid Society for Epileptics," which has the purpose of studying the causes of epilepsy and to seek funds to build an institution to case for the epileptics. Pastor Mathes will provide himself a strip of land for the intended building. Furthermore, the said society will do everything to interest the Chicago public in the needs of the benevolent enterprise and will appeal particularly to the generosity of Germans and German-Americans for contributions.
